column1: #Text=Viper says : " Mr. Chung , please tell me that you have my money , or else I ca n't guarantee I can protect your fine establishment . "
#Text=Chung says : " I 'm sorry , business has been slow .
#Text=Give me the money , or else - " Korra says : " Or else what , hoodlum ?
#Text=" Viper says : " Since you 're obviously fresh off the boat , let me explain a couple things .
#Text=You 're in Triple Threat Triad territory , and we 're about to put you , in the hospital .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 're the only ones who are gon na need a hospital and , for your sake , I hope there 's one nearby .
#Text=" Viper says : " Who do you think you are ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Why do n't you come and find out ?
